title: Plat 5 ADC Looking for Dynamic Que
body: Could be duo or ranked team or just climbers. Add me WightLightning

replies.body: hello! I have a discord community where people can find duo partners, and im making teams as well. bronze-plat elos, give us a try :3? just message the owner when you get in so you can be tagged. https://discord.gg/011amLs7jFpmDz1hb you can paste this in your browser if you dont have the app
